item.title: Monitor MongoDB using Builtin Prometheus Discovery
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Using Prometheus with KubeDB This tutorial will show you how to monitor MongoDB databases using Prometheus. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using Minikube. Now, install KubeDB cli on your workstation and KubeDB operator in your cluster following the steps here.
